text: Noriko Horiuchi (born 28 October 1965) is a Japanese politician. She has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2012. She is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. In October 2021, she became Minister of State for Vaccinations in the Fumio Kishida cabinet. She was born in Isawa, Japan. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Iwate Prefecture
title: Noriko Horiuchi
